item.title: By: Heather
item.dc:creator: Heather
item.content:encoded:
Wow. What a sad, sad little troll. With some awesome detective work.

Elbows: Sweet tapdancing christ,

…I HAVE to remember that one. *grin*

item.title: By: BigFreak
item.dc:creator: BigFreak
item.description: It has to be said, the story was fairly funny.
item.content:encoded: It has to be said, the story was fairly funny.

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
wow. I'm mostly stunned that the song "Move Along" could mean alot to someone.
My realm really needs a forum whipping boy. We haven't had one for months.
item.content:encoded:
wow. I’m mostly stunned that the song “Move Along” could mean alot to someone.

My realm really needs a forum whipping boy. We haven’t had one for months.

item.title: By: Elbows
item.dc:creator: Elbows
item.description:
Sweet tapdancing christ, as soon as I saw the OP I knew it was gonna be ridiculous. The OP is from my realm, and is ridiculed on almost a constant basis for his inane "LOOK AT ME" attention whore posts, and his terrible machina (sp?) movies which usually just include screenshots of the outside of Org and 24 point text.
He is truly reviled. He's the guy who is always making "I quit!" posts to which everyone replies "No one cares, diaf" only to show up three days later with a new movie. I see he's really trying to kick it up a notch.
On top of that, judging by his voice acting in his movies and the way he acts, general concensus is that he can't be more than 13 years old, which would have made him like 6 when EQ came out.
item.content:encoded:
Sweet tapdancing christ, as soon as I saw the OP I knew it was gonna be ridiculous. The OP is from my realm, and is ridiculed on almost a constant basis for his inane “LOOK AT ME” attention whore posts, and his terrible machina (sp?) movies which usually just include screenshots of the outside of Org and 24 point text.

He is truly reviled. He’s the guy who is always making “I quit!” posts to which everyone replies “No one cares, diaf” only to show up three days later with a new movie. I see he’s really trying to kick it up a notch.

On top of that, judging by his voice acting in his movies and the way he acts, general concensus is that he can’t be more than 13 years old, which would have made him like 6 when EQ came out.
